storyInfo: Just when everyone thought the scheme would go exactly as planned, Mulberry shows up with the village's Messenger in tow, sending the villagers into a panic. Faced with the prospect of the villagers running out of control, Qiubai steps back into the fray.

attributes.content: A fowlbeast's calls echo through the wilderness, and a fresh sun peeks out from the horizon.

The sun's color changes from day to day. Yesterday, it was shining brightly, but today it glows weakly. A few sparse rays of lights leak from the heavy clouds, coating the village in a layer of ashen gray.
An elderly man sits in a wheelchair, staring blankly at the shed in front of him.
He was instructed to call for help if he heard anything or saw someone trying to escape.
Being so old and needing help to get around, there is not much for him to do.
He was told the village has an important project, and once it's completed, everyone will be able to live a comfortable life.
In order to complete the project, he must not let the one inside escape.
He is old, but he can still offer some form of assistance, to help the village.
The morning breeze picks up, sending the blanket from his shoulders about a meter behind him.
He wants to call for help, but worries that he shouldn't alarm the group over such a minor thing. He should only cry out over the task entrusted to him.
Someone picks up the blanket, dusts it off and drapes it over his shoulders.
Oh, thank you...
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: Who do you belong to, child?
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: You're welcome.
Are the mandarins here? When will they take the prisoner away? Is the 'project' finished?
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: Do you know who is in there? Do you know what the 'project' is?
What did you say? My hearing isn't good, could you speak louder—
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: Yes, I know. I'll just sit here. I'm not going anywhere.
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: Yes, yes, pay no mind to this old man. You young people are plenty busy.
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll keep an eye on things here, no one's getting past me.
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: I've lived a life of hardship, and I won't let you young people go through that. I'll do what I have to do.
attributes.name: Very Old Man

attributes.content: The swordswoman pushes the old man's wheelchair a few steps forward, enough to catch the sun, then quietly leaves.
This should be a westward road now, so I think I'm going in the right direction.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Head straight after that sharp bend, and then turn left after passing the third fork...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But what exactly counts as a fork here...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh, I'm so glad somebody's here!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Nin hao, sir... would you happen to be from the village around here?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Huh? Who are you?
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: I'm part of the disaster relief team. I heard there was a mudslide a few days ago. I came to investigate the damage, but it looks like my map's not quite right.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Have you heard of any villages around here that were struck by a mudslide?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Us mountain folk have all the paths around here memorized. I've never heard of someone making a decent map of the place.
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: You must be asking about Moushan, that's where I'm from.
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: We suffered some heavy rain two days back, and a section of the Chidao got washed away... but the village is unscathed.
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: What a relief, so I've been going the right way after all...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: How do I get to Moushan from here?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Just continue on this road and turn north when you hit the fork in the road. It's about half a day's walk.
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: Thank you very much!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: We've laid the traps as the Elder instructed... but I hope we don't need them.
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: After all, she's only here to help the village. Let's try not to hurt her, just lead her away.
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Well I'm not the thinking type, so I'll do whatever you say.
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: What a coincidence, huh? This was supposed to be just between us and Heaven, but that stubborn Messenger had to come knocking.
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Right, who was that girl from earlier? What's she here for?
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Oh, she said she was from a disaster relief team or something and was here to check on the mudslide.
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: And you let her through just like that?!
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: The Elder told us to stop any Messengers here. What's that got to do with anyone else?
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: You idiot! The Elder stationed us here to stop the Messengers, that means he doesn't want any outsiders ruining our plans!
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Doesn't disaster relief come from the government?
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: What if the village isn't ready yet and we've spoiled everything?
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: I didn't think that far ahead... so what do we do now?
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: What else can we do?! Take the shortcut back to the village and tell the Elder!
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Tell them to hide Fang Xiaoshi in a safe place and make sure he isn't found!
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Ugh... how do I even break the news...?
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: Forget it! You stay here on lookout and I'll go report myself.
attributes.name: Passing Villager B

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: You didn't tell me how the traps work...
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: It looks pretty solid though. At a glance, you can't even tell where it is—
attributes.name: Passing Villager A

attributes.content: What's this now...?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Do you... need help?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Elder! Bad news! The mandarins are here early!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: How could this be? Didn't we agree on a time?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: *sigh* I don't know myself.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: We were waiting at the village entrance to hold off any Messengers, but that idiot Dafu spotted one and gave her actual directions instead.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: At this point, there's no turning back...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Well, it was inevitable, and better sooner than later.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: There's no need to panic, just do what you've been tasked to do. I'll ready myself and head to the village entrance.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Elder, are you sure you can handle this alone?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I have some inkling of how to settle things.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: The rest of you, do not let Fang Xiaoshi escape and make a scene. The mandarins might pay a visit to the hunter's place later.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Right, if he dares make any noise, we'll just drag him out of the village.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I've also tasked someone with sorting things out over at the hunter's place.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: We've given him so many days, but it's time for him to place the grave marker.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Alright, we'll go with this for now.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Honored ancestors, please bless us... we must pass this test...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Nin hao...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Nin hao, nin hao. I am the Clan Elder of Moushan village. We've been anticipating your arrival.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Your magisterial greatness honors us with your presence, we beg your forgiveness in forcing you to travel all the way to our remote village.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Magisterial...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Honored Elder... I heard there was a mudslide a few days ago, and wanted to get a deeper understanding of the situation.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Of course, of course. We have to be crystal clear about such an important incident.... we have already finished the preparations.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Shall I take you there now?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Preparations...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Umm... Okay! I appreciate your cooperation.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Strange. Why did the government send such a young girl?)
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: (The bag she's carrying... it doesn't look like it could hold a million.)
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi, time to go.
attributes.name: Aggressive Villager

attributes.content: Go where?!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: No questions, just come with us.
attributes.name: Aggressive Villager

attributes.content: Oh, looks like you're in a panic. Let me guess, an outsider showed up?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Sure, I'll go right now, and tell them all about your schemes!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Won't you just behave?! Stop making trouble!
attributes.name: Aggressive Villager

attributes.content: You dare headbutt me?!
attributes.name: Aggressive Villager

attributes.content: Grab a rope and come help me tie him up!
attributes.name: Aggressive Villager

attributes.content: Hunter, it's about time.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Just come with us and place the grave marker. Then it's all done.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Why the hurry? Didn't you say the mandarins were coming tomorrow?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I don't know why, but they're here today.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: So we have to finish our side of the job early.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: But I'm not done carving yet. This 'mu' character is still a few strokes short.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: This is a pretty serious thing, so we can't do a shoddy job here.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: We don't have time! This is all an act, why worry about stuff like that?!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I'm coming.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: The mudslide happened a few days ago, overnight, and this boy was at the Chidao worksite.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi was born and raised here in this village. We all loved him as a good boy with a virtuous heart, ever since he was little.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: He knew how difficult it was to build roads through the mountains and how important this project was to the village.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: He probably wanted to salvage some materials, and as a result...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I didn't expect a tragedy like this, I'm so sorry for your loss...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Disasters are merciless, but at least, wherever they happen, people always look out for each other.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Well said, Madam...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi did not die in vain, at least. He perished for the sake of the village, and we will remember him always.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: When things have settled down, we will inscribe his name in our temple.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: And for his father, his sole living relative, the village will come together to care for him.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Honored Elder, you have a kind heart.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: No, no... I am our Clan's Elder, so this is the least I can do.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Having said all that... we should probably get down to business, no...?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: You mean...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Rude as it is for me to be so forward, I'm afraid I have to ask when the compensation money will arrive...? After you verify things on your end, of course.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Compensation money?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Please, Madam, you mustn't toy with us...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi's death should be considered an accident suffered in the execution of the Chidao project, so it is reasonable to expect some compensation money.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: It's not that I hunger for wealth, but this sum of money, is critically important to our village...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I think there's been a misunderstanding, Honored Elder.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I'm not too familiar with the workings of accidental death compensation, but the government should have someone responsible for that.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I'm with 'Chun-qian', a disaster relief organization. I'm here to investigate the cause of the mudslide.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: This tragedy is heartbreaking and irreversible, but we have to do our best to make sure it doesn't happen again.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But.... This...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: (Anguished moaning)
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Don't move, let me take a look...
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Seems fine, you didn't break your ankle, at least.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: How is it, can you walk?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: What's going on? Why are there hunting traps on this path?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Well... uh...
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Spring has just begun, and some beasts made their way into the village two days back, so we're taking some precautions.
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: You still shouldn't lay traps where people walk, though. It's too dangerous... See, you only caught yourself.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Well, I'll come help you after I'm done with my work. I'm pretty good at repelling beasts.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I've got some letters to deliver, so I'd better get a move on.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: W-Wait!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Is there something else?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Are you heading to Moushan?
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Yeah, what's up?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: You... you can't go there.
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Because...
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Oh yeah! In case you didn't know, a mudslide hit this area two days ago and washed out the road!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: If the road is out, then how did you get here?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: If you could get out, then I can get in. It's just a little mountain climbing, no big deal.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: No, wait!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: What else?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I... ugh... agh!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: I told them I was a horrible liar, and they still put me out here...
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Aiyo, I'll just say it. I'm supposed to keep you from going over there.
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Even if I have to lie, or convince you or whatever, I can't let you go to the village today. Even if I have to fight you!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: I knew it...
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: You've been acting weird this whole time.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: What exactly are you guys trying to pull here?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Oh my, I really... I'm going senile.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: *sigh* If you're here about the mudslide, there really isn't much to say...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: It happened some distance away from the village, so no one was really affected by it.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I'm sorry you took the trouble to come all the way out here, but the village is fine and there's nothing worth investigating.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Honored Elder, if I could have a moment. There are still some things I want to confirm...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: A mudslide is not unusual at this time of year...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But as I understand it, it is standard procedure to build some protective fortifications on the mountain slopes before working on the Chidao proper to prevent these kinds of accidents.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: If the fortifications were erected properly, then the Chidao shouldn't have been washed away by the mudslide in the first place.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: If there were issues with the fortifications here, it means there might be issues with structural integrity elsewhere as well.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: That means there's still a chance of another mudslide further damaging the Chidao, or even hitting the village.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: So I have to head up the mountain and get to the bottom of this.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: You want to go up the mountain...?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Honored Elder, could you show me the way up?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: I'll be frank with you, girl, it's not that I don't want to help you, but it's the height of planting season. Everyone here is busy with farm work, and one man leading the way means one less hand to work the fields.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: If you really have no time to spare, I'd appreciate it if you would be so kind as to point me in the general direction, so I can make my way up alone.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: The roads in these mountains are rugged and difficult to traverse, with many branching paths, you could find it very difficult...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Worry not. I shall show thee the way.
You–
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Young Shifu Saga, what are you still doing here...?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: The past few days, I have enjoyed thine care whilst wandering these parts.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Though I may be lacking in agricultural ability and unable to assist thine farming, I am at least be able to serve as a guide.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Young Shifu, now is not the time—
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Honored Elder, I don't really understand what's going on.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I get the feeling you really don't want me going up the mountain...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: This whole time, you've been talking about how much damage the disaster has caused the village...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: So why don't you care about keeping it from happening again?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Elder, the hunter...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: (*whispering*) Elder, please...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Today is the day we put Fang Xiaoshi to rest.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Everyone present will bear witness.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: To send off a boy less than half your age is truly difficult. But life and death know not reason.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: You have done a meritorious service, dying for the village's sake. I pray you are reborn in a better family and place in your next life, and not somewhere like here.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: And thus, I declare, Fang Xiaoshi is dead.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Hunter. As his father, I think it would be best for you to place your son's grave marker yourself.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Wait, I have a question...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: You say Xiaoshi died for the village, and will be buried here...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: But have you truly treated him as one of your own?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Even when we're finished here, will you really let him live in the village?
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: What are you asking?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Come on, the mandarins might just be around the corner. Don't screw this up for us!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: How could I even...? All of you know that I'm hurt and sick, you could say I'm already halfway in the ground, at this point.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: I've been long content to live on like this, but for Xiaoshi... let my son live in peace...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Didn't we already agree to that? The Elder even swore an oath in the temple, once we finish this, the village will take care of you both. Why so uneasy?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Hunter! What are you waiting for?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'm just worried...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: You need us right now, but who knows what'll happen after you get your money. How will you treat us then? I really have no idea...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Reminds me of something someone said to me yesterday.
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: 'A man is never truly satisfied.'
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: The hunter loosens his grip, and the wooden tablet in his hand falls to the ground.
Hey—!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: We need that money to survive, and tend to the land. What's that to you? Is the Elder's word not enough, do you need the whole village to kowtow before of our ancestors for you to believe us?!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: That's not what I mean...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: We're out of time, there's nothing else we can do!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: The crowd rushes the lone man, grabbing his arms and forcing him to the grave.
One of them picks up the grave marker and shoves it back into the man's hand.
Holding the piece of wood in the midst of the crowd, he lowers his head like a burdenbeast.
The unfinished grave marker falls slowly toward the grave.
A long sword flashes across the space, splitting the wooden grave marker in two.

Facing rebels, bandits, seasoned generals, kung fu masters... whether in a fight or a competition, the way she unsheathed her sword was always more natural and unreserved than the action she just took.
The sword only barely tapped into its power, sending splinters flying erratically.
Before leaving Yumen, she told that man, 'I will find a place to bring this sword to its full potential.'
But what's the point of drawing a blade before a group of unarmed villagers?
Should she have drawn? Was she right to try and stop this?
But... why even wield a sword...

attributes.text: If you stay silent in the face of injustice?

attributes.content: Placing that grave marker would defile two lives.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Miss Qiu...
attributes.name: Hunter

attributes.content: Y-You're still here?!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I've been worried this plot of yours could go past the point of no return.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And I was absolutely right to worry.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Y-You know everything...?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Every last detail.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Then you should know we're just trying to survive here.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: These past two days, I've heard something to that effect dozens of times.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: A corpse, a name, a sum of money. Can you only survive by trampling the dignity of others?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: She does not raise her voice, but the villagers present shrink back from her. She scans their faces, the people look at her with trepidation—and at the sword in her hand.
Such looks are all too familiar to her.
Perhaps they fear more than just a sword, though. There are many things here that could seal their fates.
Perhaps they fear this sword, or perhaps the weeds of the wilderness. But have they known anything other than hardship?
The light of her sword disperses and she slips it back into its sheath, without pointing the blade at another soul.
Girl... no, Honored Master...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: This is none of your concern... I know kung fu masters like you fight for justice, but you are a mighty swordswoman, while we're... you couldn't hope to understand our lives!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: There is no difference between you and I.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Mom, I... found a government notice in Dad's bag.

'Bandits have gathered in Jiangqi, causing immeasurable suffering to the good people of the area. The troublemakers will be eliminated within the next few days, but amnesty will be granted to those miscreants who have the sense to surrender...'
Mom, please tell Dad to stop!
It's still not too late, just think about it, for your daughter's sake...
Words are cheap. We could surrender, but then what next?
Those merchants along the river, the footmen carrying grain... what wrongs have they done?
I can't help it. If need to place blame, blame the mountains for being too high or the currents for being too fast.
But...
Take good care of our daughter.

Some people are born rich, powerful, or noble, knowing not how the world truly works. Some are born to displaced families, living the same as migratory beasts, struggling day by day with no time or opportunity to think about settling down.
It is a universal sight, Catastrophes hanging over their heads, pushing the land to its limits.
There is no true justice in this world, but are the weeds by the river or the stones of the wilderness to follow, to abide it regardless?
This does not mean we should accept this injustice without reservation...

I have spent five years in Jiangqi and another five in Yumen. I have turned on the edge of this blade too many times to count... It feels like if was short a single piece of guidance or wavered in my spirit, I would have become something like the Shanhaizhong...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.text: I would have become someone like my father.

attributes.content: I understand your struggles, but they are no excuse for injustice.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: There is never an excuse for injustice.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.text: For the river will eventually swallow us all.

attributes.content: I've been reluctant to step in...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But just how far do you intend to take this?!
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi...
attributes.name: Terrified Villager

attributes.content: What happened to him?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Zhou Liu and Zhou Si were taking him to the mountain behind the village...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: To the summit?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Everyone was afraid he'd make trouble, so we decided to take him someplace far away. We never expected him to...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: It's not too late.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's as if the snow melted as quickly as it fell, and the swordswoman lost the tracks she had been following.
The hunter, still in a daze, gets to his feet and tries to catch up to her.
Two pieces of wood lay on the ground, surrounded by splinters. Some words he understood and some he did not...
The crowd gathers around the empty grave, exchanging glances. They seem to be thinking about something, but at the same time look like they've forgotten something else.
We're... done for...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Are you the resident monk here, Shifu Saga? You seem familiar with the place.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I have taken a number of momentary respites in my travels, and happened nearby the past couple of days, and so I bore witness to accident.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Now, thou art learned in the methods of disaster relief. Thine undertaking to comprehend the circumstances of the mudslide will indeed help prevent similar disasters in future. A most excellent thing.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Ah, t-thank you for escorting me, Shifu. I don't know what I would do if the villagers kept standing in my way.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Dost thou know the reason for the villagers' relentless obstruction?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Is there something hidden beneath the mudslide...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Mortal ability is indeed limited, and all that occurs on this plane is merely as one glimpses a beast through a pipe. As to secrets hidden within a Catastrophe, I dare not engage in wanton talk.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I feel there are matters I have yet to comprehend, and so I guide thee up the mountain.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Sight begets truth, and so upon arriving at our destination, thou shalt see with thine own eyes, and come to know the truth.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: This is where the mountain broke off...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Mulberry approaches the precipice, and crouches down without thinking, the dirt and rock leaving marks on her skirt.
The site of the incident lies far below, the mud appearing as if someone had casually tossed sand onto the carefully constructed lifeline, which is now severed and scribbled over.
Well? Hast thou made a discovery?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: The expression worn upon thy face is... unpleasant...
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I'm beginning to wonder... was the mudslide really a natural occurence?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: There have been a number of consecutive rain storms in the area recently, and I myself took shelter in the village on account.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Northwestern Yan has always been a dry, mountainous region; extra dry these past two years. Rainfalls have been concentrated in spring and summer, and a nearby Catastrophe has also exacerbated the climate change.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Vegetation is sparse and difficult to plant. These are mostly barren mountains with inhospitable soil and rock. What fertility the soil has is only getting worse. Coupled with intense bursts of rainfall, conditions are perfect for natural mudslides.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But... Shifu Saga, take a look over there...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: The section that didn't collapse.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Those are... the protective fortifications?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Yan has thousands of Chidaos criss-crossing the wastes and mountains where Catastrophes are frequent. Regular maintenance and rebuilding are necessary, so the initial construction efforts tend to see the most effort.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: The more complex the terrain, the more resources the construction gets.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Engineering teams reinforce the mountains on both sides of the Chidao, using solid foundations to ensure it is safe to use.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I have come to understand, that the mountains on either side of the Chidao should have been more secure.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: But more importantly...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I've found some... explosive residue.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Explosives...?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Might they be evidence of Chidao engineers drilling holes into the mountain when they established the fortifications?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: When I was interning at 'Chun-qian', we worked with Chidao engineering teams on scouting missions, assessments, and rescue operations.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: They emphasize 'Precision and Control' during construction, and use standardized explosives developed by the Ministry of Engineering for their drilling and blasting.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But in the residue I found here, the gunpowder looks really rough.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It looks more homemade.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: On my way here, I chanced upon some hunters blocking the entrance to a sand beast cave... with explosives crafted from clay.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: But who would bury such explosives on this barren summit?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: The wandering monk accidentally kicks a stone.
The stone rolls a ways down the slope before coming to a stop in a clear depression.
She pokes at the surrounding vegetation with her naginata, and the winding tracks are almost instantly blown away by the wind.
What's wrong, Shifu?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: The tracks were made by a mobility scooter.
The old man wearily drags his feet over the steps and staggers toward the outskirts of the village.
The sun gradually tilts west, forming a resplendent sunset. The last rays of the light are just right, not too hot or cold, warming him up.
At this hour, he would normally have just finished with the day's work, or settled a village affair.
There is never enough time in the farming season, but to him, a day has never felt so long.
He walks aimlessly until his legs give in and he sits down on the ground in a daze.
Elder...?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Why... why are you here?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Weren't you supposed to...?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Here's your money, Elder.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: What are you... talking about?
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: The exhausted Messenger sets the package on the ground. It gives off a muffled, heavy sound, the dust almost striking the old man's face.
Did you forget? You submitted an application two years ago.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: The subsidy you've been waiting for, it's finally here.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I set out the instant I got your message.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Yep. After Chunfen this year, the village should have some state-of-the-art farming equipment. And every household can buy a new thing or two.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: The government didn't forget about Moushan... it's just that the Catastrophe made for a pretty long delay.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Elder...?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: The old man does not move from his spot, his mouth open wide. He wants to say something, but nothing comes out.
The bundle of money on the ground is incredibly heavy. The old man feels his vision blurring, as if the mountain cleared by the excavator thousands of years ago had returned, weighing on his heart.
Go, quickly...
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Go and release Fang Xiaoshi.
attributes.name: Clan Elder

attributes.content: Elder...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi, he... he jumped off the mountain...
attributes.name: Villager
